label: cascading_failure_01_dx_dns_migration_019
content:
## 2026-01-21 Daily Operations Summary

### Metrics
#### Zone Transfers
- AXFR requests: 47
- AXFR success percentage: 95.7
- IXFR requests: 238
- IXFR success percentage: 98.1
- Transfer average milliseconds: 690
- Transfer P95 milliseconds: 1735
- TSIG failures: 2

#### TTL Changes
- Records changed: 76
- Zones touched: 10
- TTL minimum seconds: 120
- TTL maximum seconds: 86400
- TTL median seconds: 1800
- Rollbacks: 1

#### Propagation
- Cloud edge sites: 36
- Propagation average seconds: 90
- Propagation P95 seconds: 240
- Stale answer percentage: 0.9

#### DNS Queries
- QPS average: 23500
- QPS peak: 58000
- NX domain percentage: 2.2
- SERVFAIL percentage: 0.1
- UDP percentage: 96.0
- TCP fallback percentage: 1.9

#### DNSSEC
- Zones signed: 78
- Signing queue depth: 4
- Signature refreshes: 138
- DS mismatch count: 0
- Bogus validation events: 4

#### Health Checks
- Authoritative reachability percentage: 99.96
- SOA serial mismatch count: 3
- Lame delegation count: 1

#### Change Management
- Change requests: 8
- Changes applied: 7
- Changes failed: 1
- Mean time to apply minutes: 33

#### Cache Behavior
- Resolver cache hit percentage: 86.8
- Negative cache hit percentage: 42.0
- Prefetch enabled percentage: 80.0

#### Latency
- Auth response average milliseconds: 20.8
- Auth response P95 milliseconds: 55.3
- EDNS0 present percentage: 73.0

#### Errors
- Format error count: 14
- Refused count: 34
- Rate limited count: 22
- Truncation TC percentage: 0.9

#### Capacity
- Zones total: 656
- Records total: 2334000
- Dynamic updates per hour: 380

#### Compliance
- Zonefile lint errors: 7
- DNSSEC policy violations: 1
- Audit log gaps: 0

### Infrastructure
#### bind-master-01
- CPU percentage: 47
- Memory percentage: 69
- Disk used percentage: 78
- Network in Mbps: 118
- Network out Mbps: 160
- Open files: 1450
- NTP offset milliseconds: 2

#### bind-slave-02
- CPU percentage: 35
- Memory percentage: 60
- Disk used percentage: 58
- Network in Mbps: 98
- Network out Mbps: 112
- Open files: 1322
- NTP offset milliseconds: 2

#### cloud-dns-sync-01
- CPU percentage: 72
- Memory percentage: 81
- Disk used percentage: 54
- Network in Mbps: 150
- Network out Mbps: 190
- Queue depth: 13
- NTP offset milliseconds: 2

#### signer-01
- CPU percentage: 55
- Memory percentage: 82
- Disk used percentage: 64
- Network in Mbps: 24
- Network out Mbps: 29
- HSM slot utilization percentage: 68
- NTP offset milliseconds: 2

### Events
- Migrated 16 zones during peak query period; observed temporary increase in transfer latency and propagation P95; rescheduled remaining migrations to off-peak.
- One change failed due to missing NS record in child zone delegation; corrected hierarchy and re-applied pipeline.
- Lame delegation alert triggered for one subzone after partial registrar update; validated glue and completed registrar correction.
- Performed targeted TTL reduction (1800->120) for incident response readiness on 10 zones; rolled back one zone with strict vendor requirements.

### On Call
- Shift: B. Fischer
- Pages: 4
- Tickets: 9
- Status: Elevated activity during peak migration; stabilized by rescheduling and fixing delegation gaps.
